danfulea.math

Class RandomCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • danfulea.math.RandomCollection

  • public class RandomCollection
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used for handling several random number methods.
    Author:
    Dan Fulea, 14 APR. 2011

        Returns a random number having uniform distribution with parameters a and b.
        Parameters:

      • draw

        public static boolean draw(double probability)
        Returns true with given probability.
        Parameters:
        probability - probability that true will be returned
        Returns:
        true if a randomly generated number from <0,1) is less than or equal to the parameter

      • gauss

        public static double gauss(double mu,
                           double sigma)
        Returns a random number having Gaussian (normal) distribution with parameters mi and sigma
        Parameters:
        mu - parameter mu (mean value) of the normal-distribution generator
        sigma - parameter sigma (variance) of the normal-distribution generator
        Returns:
        a random number having normal distribution with parameters mu and sigma
